argumentText:
ARGUMENT
f x

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | psrvsca.s | |- S = ( I mPwSer R ) |
| 2 |  | psrvsca.n | |- .xb = ( .s ` S ) |
| 3 |  | psrvsca.k | |- K = ( Base ` R ) |
| 4 |  | psrvsca.b | |- B = ( Base ` S ) |
| 5 |  | psrvsca.m | |- .x. = ( .r ` R ) |
| 6 |  | psrvsca.d | |- D = { h e. ( NN0 ^m I ) | ( `' h " NN ) e. Fin } |
| 7 |  | psrvsca.x | |- ( ph -> X e. K ) |
| 8 |  | psrvsca.y | |- ( ph -> F e. B ) |
| 9 |  | #P_sneq | |- ( x = X -> { x } = { X } ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_xpeq2d | |- ( x = X -> ( D X. { x } ) = ( D X. { X } ) ) |
| 11 | 10 | #P_oveq1d | |- ( x = X -> ( ( D X. { x } ) oF .x. f ) = ( ( D X. { X } ) oF .x. f ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_oveq2 | |- ( f = F -> ( ( D X. { X } ) oF .x. f ) = ( ( D X. { X } ) oF .x. F ) ) |
| 13 | 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6 | #P_psrvscafval | |- .xb = ( x e. K , f e. B |-> ( ( D X. { x } ) oF .x. f ) ) |
| 14 |  | #P_ovex | |- ( ( D X. { X } ) oF .x. F ) e. _V |
| 15 | 11, 12, 13, 14 | #P_ovmpt2 | |- ( ( X e. K /\ F e. B ) -> ( X .xb F ) = ( ( D X. { X } ) oF .x. F ) ) |
| 16 | 7, 8, 15 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ph -> ( X .xb F ) = ( ( D X. { X } ) oF .x. F ) ) |
